metadata.title: ORUS Gallery | Contemporary Art | Taiwan
metadata.description: ORUS Gallery represents international contemporary artists for Asian and global collectors. Origin + Us: where art meets identity.

mission.label: Mission
mission.text1: Connecting international contemporary artists with Asian and global collectors.
mission.text2: Taiwan as strategic entry point — a growing market with deep institutional and collector infrastructure.
mission.text3: Structured diffusion through exhibitions, private sales, and targeted fairs.

team.label: Team
team.placeholder: Team profiles will be published shortly.

partnerships.label: Partnerships
partnerships.description: ORUS Gallery works with institutions, corporate collectors, and private clients seeking structured access to contemporary art. We facilitate long-term relationships grounded in curatorial integrity and market knowledge.

curatorial.title: Where Art Meets Identity
curatorial.text1: ORUS Gallery emerges from a profound conviction: art transcends borders, cultures, and time. Based in Taiwan with deep connections to Paris, we champion contemporary artists whose work explores memory, identity, and the human condition.
curatorial.text2: We believe in continuity over speed, depth over breadth. Each artist we represent carries a singular voice that resonates across cultures, creating bridges between the intimate and the universal.

pillar1.title: Exacting Curation
pillar1.text: Every artist in our roster is selected through rigorous evaluation. We represent only those whose vision and craft meet our exacting standards.

pillar2.title: Bespoke Collector Support
pillar2.text: Personal advisory services tailored to your journey. From first acquisition to building a comprehensive collection, we guide you at every step.

pillar3.title: International Network
pillar3.text: With presence in Taiwan and Paris, we connect Asian collectors with European artists and facilitate cross-cultural dialogue through art.

cta.title: Start a Conversation
cta.subtitle: We welcome inquiries from collectors and art enthusiasts. Our team responds within 24 hours.
